item.description: It's La Lettre Jerriaise (Jersey Norman French), the French Chronicle with Xavier Souris, Portuguese news with Rui Pires and Polish news with Alex Szubert.
item.itunes:subtitle: Conversations in Jerriais, French, Portuguese and Polish reflecting Jersey's diversity.
item.itunes:summary: It's La Lettre Jerriaise (Jersey Norman French), the French Chronicle with Xavier Souris, Portuguese news with Rui Pires and Polish news with Alex Szubert.
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio Jersey
